product_summary: Flatlogic is an AI-powered platform that enables businesses to create Business Software in just 3 steps. Leverage Flatlogic generator, templates and our customization services to save more than \$15,000 while supercharging your business efficiency and growth.
product_pros: Saves time and money by automating up to 90% of development.
Generates custom code that is tailored to your business needs.
Provides a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to create complex software.
Offers a wide range of templates and services to help you get started.
Supports a variety of programming languages and technologies.
product_cons: May not be suitable for all types of software projects.
Can be expensive for some users.
Requires some technical knowledge to use effectively.
May not be able to handle all of the features that you need.
It is not as customizable as some other development platforms, which could be a drawback.

product_usecases.details: Flatlogic can help you create a minimum viable product (MVP) in just 30 days, saving you time and money.
Flatlogic can help you create a custom ERP system that is tailored to your business needs.
Flatlogic can help you create a custom CRM system that will help you manage your customer relationships.
Flatlogic can help you create web applications that are responsive, user-friendly, and secure.
Flatlogic can help you create an admin panel that gives you control over your website or application.

product_toolfor.details: Flatlogic is a great tool for developers who want to save time and money on development projects.
Flatlogic is a great tool for businesses who want to create custom software without the need for a large investment.
Flatlogic is a great tool for startups who want to get their products to market quickly and affordably.
Flatlogic is a great tool for entrepreneurs who want to create their own software products.
Flatlogic is a great tool for freelancers who want to offer their clients high-quality software development services.

product_pricing: $33/month for the Individual Plan, $333/month for the Professional Plan, and custom pricing for the Enterprise Plan.
